heading: Want to be up to date?
description: Subscribe to get notifications about posts, case studies and other content. But be aware - if you get a lucrative offer from a Nigerian prince from this domain, it’s not me - unsubscribe fast. I don’t send spam.

success.heading: Thank you for signing up!
success.description: You'll receive notifications via email. If you don't receive an email shortly, double check your email boxes.

error.heading: Something went wrong.
error.description: There was an issue trying to submit. Check your email and try again.
